creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones
description: man in dark garments and round glasses with large (false?) nose, separating a short man in a large overcoat with arms crossed and a woman in a gown and slippers with clenched fist
inscription:
Signature, date and inscription
LLC, in pencil: [684]
signed: LLC, in the plate (backwards): [Gavarni./ 164]; below image, in brown ink: [No 1099/ 10 (illegible) 1838]
title: J'vous dis que vot' femme a insulté la mienne, m'sieu!
